name: Disable Woocommerce Categories
author: Nuno Alexandre

sections.description:
Disable Woocommerce Categories is a WordPress plugin that allows you to quickly disable any woocommerce categories
to show on any of your front pages.
sections.installation:
1. Download Disable Woocommerce Categories.
  2. Unzip the disable-woocommerce-category.zip file.
  3. Activate the plugin on your plugins page.
  4. You can edit the options by going under “Settings” and then “Disable Woocommerce Categories.”
sections.changelog:
0.2 Beta

  • July 1, 2018 – Many changes at code base level.
    Added validation and better security

0.1 Beta

  • June 30, 2018 – Initial release

  4. You can edit the options by going under “Settings” and then “Disable Woocommerce Categories.”
